name: another Pong Experience Project, back to the root of video game (PeP2Root)
name_original: another Pong Experience Project, back to the root of video game (PeP2Root)
description:
let's go back in time, when atari was the master of all consoles, when friends were gathering at the arcade, and play simpler games.

but let's reinvent it with brand new tech, here, you can play pong with your friend, with your keyboard or two differents joypads,

Let's go back to the roots of videogames, pong, tennis for two... and let's play :)
